org.fest.assertions
Class DoubleAssert

java.lang.Object
  org.fest.assertions.DoubleAssert

public final class DoubleAssert
extends Object

Understands Assertion methods for Double. To create a new instance of this class use the method Assertions.assertThat(double).

Author:
Yvonne Wang

Nested Class Summary
static class DoubleAssert.WithDelta
          Understands assertion methods for double values using a positive delta.

withDelta

public DoubleAssert.WithDelta withDelta(double delta)
Intermediate method that returns assertion methods for double values using a delta.

This method is expected to be used like this: 

 double result = total(price, discount);
 assertThat(result).withDelta(0.4d).isEqualTo(expected);

Parameters:
delta - the delta to use.
Returns:
the delta-aware assertion object.

description

public final String description()
Returns the description of the actual boolean value in this assertion.

Returns:
the description of the actual boolean value in this assertion.
